version_description:
We've fixed a recent bug and ICQ works well on all devices now.

Long time no see? It's all because we've got a big update together:
• We've removed snaps and stories (Finally! They're everywhere. So tired of them!)
• We've made audio and vide

Long time no see? It's all because we've got a big update together:
• We've removed snaps and stories (Finally! They're everywhere. So tired of them!)
• We've made audio and video calls even better
• Created convenient answers in chats
• Got f

Hi all! Now you can create your own stickers! Add Sticker Bot icq.com/714347882, create memes and share with your friends.

A new update has landed:
• Chats now always open at unread messages — you won't miss out!
• We've made messages deliver

Hi all! Now you can create your own stickers! Add Sticker Bot icq.com/100500, create memes and share with your friends.

A new update has landed:
• Chats now always open at unread messages — you won't miss out!
• We've made messages delivery f
Hi all! A new update has landed with more compact Chats, slightly increased font, the Search has become beautiful and convenient. Enjoy!

Want awesome updates? Look what we've done:
• Mention people in the chat! Write @ and a list of your friends to mention will appear. They'll get a notification even if the chat is muted. Now nobody can pretend not to have seen a message!
• Woo! Forw

• Woo! Forw

• Group video calls: for a whole 5 people, from any device, audio or video, call immediately or add one person at a time, call in chat, call in masks!
• Pins in group chats: pin a message and we'll notify all the chat participants about it.
• Send p

Jokes aside, let us tell you what's new
• Group video calls: for a whole 5 people, from any device, audio or video, call immediately or add one person at a time, call in chat, call in masks!
• Pins in group chats: pin a message and we'll notify all

In this update, we've brought you:
• Message editing! (applause, whistles, euphoria)
• A new sticker window, search by stickers, choose stickers for an entered emoji
• A special mark indicating that you've been mentioned in a chat. Mark your f

• A special tag indicating that you've been mentioned in a chat. Mark you

New input field, sending files and viewing the full list of participants in large groups
- Now everything you need is at hand in one click. Camera and gallery - right in the input field
- Send photos, videos, files without compression - click on the
More emotions! Now when you enter words stickers are suggested, diversify your communication

Hi all! We have some very noteworthy and important changes for you that will make our app easier to use.

New design for the chat list:
• message time shown
• status of outgoing private and group messages

New features:
• mark a chat

More great changes: 
- Find messages – has appeared in the chat list! 
- Amaze your friends with new stickers – sticker hints now show when entering emojis! 
- It's now even easier to create channels and subscribe to them!

- Add text to photos before sending them
- Add new contacts directly to the app

You asked, we listened. Update to the new version of ICQ with the gallery. In chat and group profiles you can see all of the photos, videos, and files from its history

New ways to send voice messages, geo location and contacts sharing, iOS 13 support.
- Send voice messages by holding the button or just by tapping
- Send contacts directly from the chat
- Share your location without leaving the app

New ways to send voice messages, geo location and contacts sharing, iOS 13 support.
- Send voice messages by holding the button or just by tapping
- Send contacts directly from the chat
- Share your location without leaving the app

- Quick action in the channels
- The indicator is expected to enter into a group
- Now you can directly share files and stickers!
As well as bug fixes and improvements.
The updated design of the entrance, as well as bug fixes and improvements

Come up with a beautiful links to public groups and channels!

- new handy gallery to send media
- creating a group has never been easier
- you can send chat files from another application in a single click (iOS 13)
- updated surveys: you can now create even one answer choice
- modified smart answers

- Upgraded chat with yourself - Now it's "Favorites" Use it as your personal storage space for messages and files.
- Now displays not only text notifications, but also pictures
- Fix typos with the help of friendly tips
- Those who have alread

Introducing ICQ New!

There is a lot of cool ahead, and right now:
- New style. Updated logo, app icon and colors as well as new dark theme
- Smart replies. Reply to a message with a single click - ICQ suggests answers even before you've star

Introducing ICQ New!

There is a lot of cool ahead, and right now:
- New style. Updated logo, app icon and colors as well as new dark theme
- Smart replies. Reply to a message with a single click - ICQ suggests answers even before you've star

— You asked, we listened: video rewind option is available
— Favorites has become even more convenient
— Send commands to bots in one touch

And also a lot of fixes and improvements!

- Now you can set emoji statuses, for example: Girl Power, Busy, Winner in life. And many others.
- Likes / dislikes on other people's posts (feature will be available soon)
- You do not want to read the chat yet, but you need to look? Long press to

- Now you can set emoji statuses, for example: Girl Power, Busy, Winner in life. And many others.
- Likes / dislikes on other people's posts (feature will be available soon)
- You do not want to read the chat yet, but you need to look? Long press to

- Now you can set emoji statuses, for example: Girl Power, Busy, Winner in life. And many others.
- Likes / dislikes on other people's posts (feature will be available soon)
- You do not want to read the chat yet, but you need to look? Long press to

- No more time limits for video recording!
- Now you can search for messages in all chats at once through a general search
- New themes

As well as fixes and improvements

- Сhannel administration has become easier: now channel administrator can edit any post 
- Added a pop-up with status description when status is tapped in user’s profile
- Added the ability to save captured photos or videos even before sending

- Added a search box in statuses. Finding the right one just got easier.
And also many fixes and improvements.

- Sometimes it was not clear why it is impossible to add people to the group. We add a description of possible causes.
- Search for people and chats become easier: now the whole list can be seen immediately.
- And traditionally corrected minor bugs

- Sometimes it was not clear why you can't add people to the group. Added descriptions of possible causes.
- Search for people and chats become easier: now the whole list can be seen immediately.
- And traditionally fixed minor bugs
